name: Tower Of Light (DEMO VERSION)
description:
Tower Of Light is a game where you attempt to scale the tower of light, doing so will grant you a singular wish 

WARNING

as this is the demo version it is very buggy and unfinished as it only has (10) playable levels. it also has 0% of the game story in it as it is only the first 10 layers of the tower. 

-Gloom
